Simple Pricing

A flat rate only for network requests routed through Caffeine.

Standard

$0.40 per 1k requests that use Caffeine
  • 30-day risk-free trial with no credit card required
  • $19 monthly minimum
  • Improved network security and perfect forward secrecy
  • Drag and drop integration using our client libraries and documentation
  • Accelerate content load times by 50-300%.
  • Peace of mind about running your app so you can get back to building user features
  • Built-in A/B testing functionality

Sign up now

Premium

For high volume applications or larger corporations we offer additional levels of support and discounted pricing starting at $849/month.
  • Dedicated account executive
  • Expanded technical support
  • Custom invoicing with option to pay by wire or check
  • Weekly summaries analyzing 6-dimensions of network latency per request in your app
  • MSA/SLA
